Moreover, <quote>Rule4 is preferred over Rule3</quote>, which means even if there might be conflicting conditions under Rule3, Rule4 takes precedence. The game state provides no evidence contradicting the two conditions in Rule4, thus the answer is conclusively "proved".
</argument>
